Text: Please offer the AVI file as well! Can't you see people want AVI's, just look at how many people are not downloading this crap mp4. C'mon EZTV listen to the people!

Great show hosted by Joel McHale about crazy Hollywood by the week.  New software out for trackers, works twice as fast and compresses files smaller with higher res, so thats why the format is changing.  Thanks for sharing - enjoy!
I must say I don't mind mp4 as it is good quality sorry, as long as it is not wmv I am good with it.
